jack-knife.translation[0].definitions[0]: a knife with a blade that folds into its handle
jack-knife.translation[0].definitions[1]: a dive in which you bend at the waist when you are in the air
jack-knife.translation[1].definitions[0]: if a large vehicle with two parts jack-knifes, it slides out of control and the back part swings towards the front part
The truck skidded on the ice and jack-knifed.
